scripts.startDev: docker run -u node --name whiteboard-server-dev -e NODE_ENV=dev -e WHITEBOARD_CONFIG=config/config.json -e WHITEBOARD_DB=db/database.sqlite -e WHITEBOARD_PORT=3000 -e WHITEBOARD_CERT=crt/example.crt -e WHITEBOARD_KEY=crt/example.key -v ${PWD}/db:/usr/src/app/db -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 -d whiteboard-server:dev
scripts.start: docker run -u node --name whiteboard-server-prod -e NODE_ENV=production -e WHITEBOARD_CONFIG=config/config.json -e WHITEBOARD_DB=db/database.sqlite -e WHITEBOARD_PORT=3000 -e WHITEBOARD_CERT=crt/example.crt -e WHITEBOARD_KEY=crt/example.key -v ${PWD}/db:/usr/src/app/db -p 127.0.0.1:3000:3000 -d whiteboard-server:prod
